typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	alds_folder as string,
	staging_directory as string,
	destination_folder as string,
	keycolumn as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: ($alds_folder),
	folderPath: (concatWS('/',$staging_directory,$destination_folder))) ~> ExistingDeltaTable
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1, ExistingDeltaTable exists($keycolumn == $keycolumn,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: ($alds_folder),
	folderPath: (concatWS('/',$staging_directory,$destination_folder)),
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:[($keycolumn)],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
